file_content.text: Our eyes are watching. Our ears are hearing. Always.
Ah, have you found it then, the communication device, which the spy Alma called an heirloom?
Take the heirloom.
Here you go.
Good, good. Here is the small pay which we can give you from the Republic in gratitude of your aid catching this spy.
Shouldn't you go arrest her?
Go take Alma into custody.
I guess I'll be living cheap this year. Great.
Don't overdo it.
We are sorry that there is no more to pay, but the Republic's funds run tight as the Empire encroaches.
All in the service of the Republic!
For the rightful government!
Maybe so. Maybe you only did it because of your duty. But if we all do our duty, then there will be no more need of fighting or of spies.
Now we must analyze the communication device, which is called an heirloom, and set our trap for the spy who is called a Republic citizen.
It will take time, but we will arrest her and learn much about her contacts, too. It is a great service you have done. Thank you.
No problem.
It's my job.
I prefer my thanks in credit form.
Pay me more next time.
Thank you and good luck. We will bring her in soon. We promise.
I'll be, uh, getting it soon.
[Lie] No, not yet.
Ah, well, seek it out with both eyes and bring it to us. Quickly!
You must find the communication device, which is called a necklace, and bring it to us. The scavengers have taken it.
Ah, who is this poking around in the house of eyes? Strange coincidence that we are all here now.
I don't understand.
Why is it a coincidence?
What do you mean?
Explain yourself or prepare to fight.
I'm losing patience here.
There's no need for fighting.
We think maybe you are looking for the same thing as us, and so you have come to the same place. It is not surprising that she should send someone.
She sent you here for her necklace, yes? That confirms our suspicions. It is a good thing that you have come, yes, to confirm our suspicions.
I didn't come to confirm anything.
That's not why I'm here.
You did not come for that purpose, but that is what you have done.
Are we talking about the same necklace here?
I'm confused.
The same necklace, but different stories, we suspect. She is a crafty one--crafty and tricky. But you were not fooled, we think.
You're mistaken.
You talk of knowledge, but I wonder what it is you know and what it is she told you.
She has called it a family heirloom, yes. We have heard it being called that with both ears. But it is much more than a necklace.
This woman you have met, this woman called Alma is a spy, yes. We have been keeping both eyes on her.
What does this have to do with the necklace?
What about the heirloom?
And you're sure because?
Tell me what's going on here!
Explain this to me.
We are with the Republic. We are the ones who watch spies. But she watches for the others--for the Empire. They have both eyes on Ord Mantell--her eyes.
Her heirloom is a communicator that looks like a necklace. A necklace that works like a communication device. She uses it to speak to the Empire.
Either way, it is the proof we need to arrest her with both hands. Do you understand now?
If she's an Imperial spy, we can't let her get away with it.
We have to stop her.
I don't care who she talks to--she's paying me.
Doesn't matter to me.
We can pay you too, though perhaps not so much. You must decide your loyalty.
So you want me to help?
I'm totally lost.
Not at all.
Then we will explain again. The woman whose heirloom you seek is an enemy, and the heirloom is the tool she uses to betray us. We must stop her.
The necklace is the first thing. We must find it.
The scavengers have beaten us to this place and taken it. We must steal it back to stop the spying woman. This is something you can do, yes?
We can't delay.
Then we are in accord.
Where are these scavengers?
How do I find them?
We will mark the location of the scavengers on your map. There you will find the communication device, which is called an heirloom.
I can do it. I don't know if I will.
We'll see.
We do not like that you would help a traitor to the Republic, but we can do nothing against you until you act. Such is our paralysis.
If you are wishing to help, though, we will mark the scavengers' location on your map. There you will find the communication device, which is called an heirloom.
We will compensate you on your return.
We watch. We listen. Always.
